SELECT BOARD_NO , POST_NO , TITLE , CONTENT , INSRT_USR , INSRT_DT , UPDT_USR , UPDT_DT FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() over ( ORDER BY POST_NO ) AS ROW_NUM , * FROM SPRING_POST WHERE 1 = 1 AND BOARD_NO = #{board_no} AND TITLE LIKE '%' + #{keyword} + '%' AND DELETE_FLG = 'N' ) A WHERE ROW_NUM BETWEEN (#{page_no}-1)*#{per_page} + 1 AND #{page_no}*#{per_page}
